text: Usava unomira (uchinamata) imomo zvachose. Zvirokwazvo, Masjid (nzvimbo yekunamatira) iyo mudhuri wayo wakavakwa kubva musi wekutanga pahutsvene zvakanyanya kukosha kuti umire imomo (uchinamata). Mukati mayo mune varume vanoda kuzvichenesa pachezvavo. Uye Allah vanoda avo vanozvichenesa (avo vanochenura nhengo dzavo dzakavanzika nevhu nemvura kubva kuweti netsvina hombe)
